events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund case for order #123456.
Hello, I’m Emily from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order confirmation to proceed with the refund?
Here are the photos of the item I got and my order receipt attached for your review and processing.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. Please check your payment method for the credited amount shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, the refund appeared in my account yesterday. Thanks again for the efficient support!
We are glad the issue is fully resolved. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us anytime in the future.
